examples.example: 培养一项爱好可以让我们的生活更加丰富多彩。

translate.english: Cultivating a hobby can make our life more rich and colorful.

examples.example: 他坚持自己的爱好，每天都抽出时间来练习绘画，水平提升得很快。

translate.english: He adheres to his hobby, takes time to practice painting every day, and his level improves very quickly.

examples.example: 拥有爱好是一件多么美好的事情，它能给我们带来无尽的快乐和满足感。

translate.english: Having a hobby is such a wonderful thing, which can bring us endless happiness and a sense of satisfaction.
